localString.value: Spirits, usually made from distilled grains, are very potent and should not be taken lightly.
Either a dark red or pale yellow, wine is made from the pressing of grapes that have been fermented and aged.
Thick tallow candles burn low upon their iron stand. Small mounds have formed on the floor below, where the fallen tallow has accumulated.
It is a simple chair but the grace of its lines speaks to the quality of its craftmanship.

This is a standard slot machine, a strange contraption, first invented by Gnomes as a means of getting random results for their experiments, it was soon after bought by a large group of enterprising goblins and turned into the gambling machine it is today.
Slot Odds

Slot Odds and Payoffs Odds are 1:216
Diamond - Diamond - Mug........2-1 Diamond - Diamond - Bell.........3-1 Diamond - Diamond - Dagger...4-1 Diamond - Diamond - Arrow......5-1 Diamond - Diamond - Gold........6-1 Mug - Mug - Mug......................4-1 Bell - Bell - Bell..........................8-1 Dagger - Dagger - Dagger........10-1 Arrow - Arrow - Arrow................12-1 Gold - Gold - Gold.....................24-1 Diamond - Diamond - Diamond.36-1
